name: He Is Profound
description:
Admit, avert, or admonish the truth in ‘He Is Profound’, a ‘choose your own assumption’ experience where you must recount a history you’ve never heard.

Author
Hayden Reeve

Contact Information
Twitter: https://twitter.com/greysion
DeviantArt: https://greysion.deviantart.com

Developer Notes
He Is Profound is a small narrative based challenge I undertook for GDS220, a trimester spanning project that was designed to offer a compelling yet short psychological experiment.

The game is reasonably short-lived, with a focus on repetition based game play and player choices. Do they even matter?
